des: "Crackers, bread sticks and vegetables all become fabulous when dipped in this cream cheese base shrimp spread."
ins: In a medium bowl, beat together the cream cheese, lemon juice and hot sauce until well blended and fluffy. Mix in the shrimp and green onions. Form into a mound on a medium serving platter. Cover and chill in the refrigerator 1 hour, or until firm. Top with cocktail sauce before serving.
